name: Tyrik VERNON, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS DEPARTMENT OF RECORDS et al., Respondents
name_abbreviation: Vernon v. Philadelphia Court of Common Pleas Departmnet of Records

parties: Tyrik VERNON, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS DEPARTMENT OF RECORDS et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of November, 2014, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
103 A.3d 1291
Tyrik VERNON, Petitioner v. PHILADELPHIA COURT OF COMMON PLEAS DEPARTMENT OF RECORDS et al., Respondents.

Nov. 19, 2014.
